overview: "Triptyque Petite" is part of a serie. Like the pages of a diary. Exposing the strong themes of life, the short films, through the main character 'Petite', leads us by the hand into an intimate symbolic reality/fantasy world, where images, sounds and music merge past memories or a projection into the future or the other way around.  Now we see â€˜Petite' as a child, now a teenager, now a mature woman, now an elderly women...
title: Petite Triptyque
